article_title: Will the Pope's new American archbishop address income inequality?
article_text:

twitter.description: The rap on Blase Cupich is that he’s a Pope Francis kind of guy. Which is to say that he’s politically moderate, opposed to the lavish lifestyle that some of his peers have formerly embraced (i...
twitter.title: Will the Pope’s new American archbishop address income inequality?

article_metadata.keywords: pope francis, blase cupich, roman catholic church, catholic church, catholics, income inequality, wealth gap
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: Blase Cupich, Catholic, Catholic Church, Christopher Reyes, Economy, Income inequality, Pope Francis, The Roman Catholic Church, Wealth Gap
article_metadata.sailthru.title: Will the Pope’s new American archbishop address income inequality?
article_metadata.description: Blase Cupich is opposed to the lavish lifestyle that some of his peers embrace and has what is referred to as “a heart for the poor." His elevation signals where Pope Francis intends to take the American church.
